game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience the story of former outlaw John Marston as he tracks down the last remaining members of the notorious Van der Linde Gang in the PC debut of the critically acclaimed predecessor to Red Dead Redemption 2.

reviewHighlights.text: this game is peak but a rdr1 port shouldnt cost more than rdr2 wait for a sale dont pay full price for a port
